works.description: the von Essen’s Amberley Castle luxury hotel in West Sussex introduced the world’s most expensive first date package ever for £45,000 per couple, and now, von Essen’s Cliveden hotel in Berkshire is offering the world’s most expensive afternoon tea, priced at £550 ($900) per couple. Executive head chef Carlos Martinez has created the afternoon tea for two. For the hefty price, this tea includes white truffles at a £2,500 per kilogram, Beluga Caviar at £4,000 per kilogram and Da Hong Pao Tea at over £2,000 per kilogram.
